comments:
I am trying to get in touch with International ISBN Agency to get my personal information removed. No response from last 2 months.

I obtained ISBN from ISBN agency in India. I signup as a self publisher, I had to provide my ID card personal information which has been published on International ISBN Agency website Global Register of Publishers database. I am not a book publisher, I am an author who have self published books.
